00001 //Description: Handle database I/O and user interface 
00002 //             for CDC geometry parameters
00003 //Author: Wu Chen(wuchen@mail.ihep.ac.cn)
00004 //Created: 26 Aug, 2014
00005 //Comment: The units are "mm"(default), "um"(for wire radius) and "rad". 
00006 //Comment: Datum plain is upstream end plate of CDC
00007 //Comment: fVerboseLevel: 0:    Just Warning Messages and Error Messages
00008 //                        1:    + Dump()
00009 //                        >= 5: All informations
00010 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00011

00024 CdcGeometryParameter::CdcGeometryParameter(G4String name, G4String opt )
00025         : SimpleGeometryParameter(name, "S") // Use a not-empty opt to stop inherited class from creating new GeometryParameterMessenger
00026 {
00027         if ( opt == "" ){
00028                 CdcGeometryParameterMessenger *pointer = new CdcGeometryParameterMessenger(this, name);
00029                 //std::cout<<"======>In CdcGeometryParameter, new CdcGeometryParameterMessenger at ("<<(void*)pointer<<")!"<<std::endl;
00030                 set_GeometryParameterMessenger(pointer);
00031         }
00032 }
00033 
00034 CdcGeometryParameter::~CdcGeometryParameter(){
00035         printf("~CdcGeometryParameter");
00036 }

00038 //---------------------------InitFromFile---------------------------------
00039 //will be called in CdcGeometrySvc::SetCdc
00040 void CdcGeometryParameter::InitFromFile( G4String file_name ){
00041         set_filename(file_name);
00042 
00043         //Remember to preset first!
00044         Preset();
00045 
00046         std::ifstream fin_card(file_name);
00047         if(!fin_card){
00048                 DEBUG("CdcGeometryParameter::InitFromFile(), cannot find subgeometry card: \""+file_name+"\"");
00049         }
00050         std::string s_card;
00051         while(getline(fin_card,s_card)){
00052                 //eleminate useless lines
00053                 if ( ISEMPTY(s_card) ) continue;
00054                 int status = GetValue(s_card);
00055                 if( status > 0 ){
00056                         G4String content = "CdcGeometryParameter: unknown line:" + s_card + "\n  in file " + file_name + "! Will ignore this line!";
00057                         DEBUG(content,0);
00058                 }
00059         }
00060         fin_card.close();
00061         if (CheckInfo()){
00062                 DEBUG("CdcGeometryParameter::InitFromFile(), insufficient simple solid info");
00063         }
00064         Calculate();
00065 }
00066 
00067 void CdcGeometryParameter::Dump(){
00068         DumpInfo();
00069 }

00071 //-----------------------------------Special functions---------------------------------------------
00072 
00073 bool CdcGeometryParameter::CheckInfo(){
00074         bool flag = false;// false means no problem
00075         flag = SimpleGeometryParameter::CheckInfo();
00076         if (flag) return flag;// if something is wrong with its Parent Class, then return the status.
00077 
00078         //examine
00079         if(     !check_LayerNo(layer_Re.size()) ||
00080                         !check_LayerNo(layer_length.size()) ){
00081                 flag = true;
00082         }
00083         return flag;
00084 }
00085 
00086 void CdcGeometryParameter::Preset(){
00087         SimpleGeometryParameter::Preset();// Call its Parent class to preset
00088         vis_cell = false;
00089         vis_layer = false;
00090         vis_SignalWire = false;
00091         vis_FieldWire = false;
00092         LayerNo = 0;
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 int CdcGeometryParameter::GetValue(G4String s_card){
00097         if (!SimpleGeometryParameter::GetValue(s_card)) return 0; // if found by Parent Class, then return.
00098         int status = 0;// 0 means found the value
00099         std::stringstream buf_card;
00100         buf_card.str("");
00101         buf_card.clear();
00102         buf_card<<s_card;
00103         std::string name;
00104         buf_card>>name;
00105         G4int tlayer_type, tlayer_ID, tlayer_SkipHoles, tlayer_firstWire, tlayer_HoleNo;
00106         G4double tlayer_Re, tlayer_length;
00107         std::string dump;
00108         LayerNo = 0;
00109         if( name == "MotherLogicalVolume:" ) buf_card>>MotherLogicalVolume;
00110         else if( name == "CellMaterial:" ) buf_card>>CellMaterial;
00111         else if( name == "SensitiveDetector:" ) buf_card>>SensitiveDetector;
00112         else if( name == "SDVolumeName:" ) buf_card>>SDVolumeName;
00113         else if( name == "MinStepLength:" ) buf_card>>MinStepLength;
00114         else if( name == "SignalWireMaterial:" ) buf_card>>SignalWireMaterial;
00115         else if( name == "FieldWireMaterial:" ) buf_card>>FieldWireMaterial;
00116         else if( name == "SignalWireRadius:" ) {
00117                 buf_card>>SignalWireRadius;
00118                 SignalWireRadius *= um;
00119         }
00120         else if( name == "FieldWireRadius:" ) {
00121                 buf_card>>FieldWireRadius;
00122                 FieldWireRadius *= um;
00123         }
00124         else if( name == "vis_layer" ){
00125                 vis_layer = true;
00126                 buf_card>>r_layer>>g_layer>>b_layer;
00127         }
00128         else if( name == "vis_cell" ){
00129                 vis_cell = true;
00130                 buf_card>>r_cell>>g_cell>>b_cell;
00131         }
00132         else if( name == "vis_FieldWire" ){
00133                 vis_FieldWire = true;
00134                 buf_card>>r_FieldWire>>g_FieldWire>>b_FieldWire;
00135         }
00136         else if( name == "vis_SignalWire" ){
00137                 vis_SignalWire = true;
00138                 buf_card>>r_SignalWire>>g_SignalWire>>b_SignalWire;
00139         }
00140         else{
00141                 std::stringstream buf_temp;
00142                 if( name == "F" || name == "S" || name == "G" ){
00143                         buf_card>>dump>>tlayer_ID>>tlayer_Re>>tlayer_length>>tlayer_HoleNo>>tlayer_SkipHoles>>tlayer_firstWire;
00144                         tlayer_length *= cm;
00145                         tlayer_Re *= cm;
00146                         if (name=="F")
00147                                 layer_type.push_back(0);
00148                         else if (name=="S")
00149                                 layer_type.push_back(1);
00150                         else if (name=="G")
00151                                 layer_type.push_back(2);
00152                         layer_ID.push_back(tlayer_ID);
00153                         layer_Re.push_back(tlayer_Re);
00154                         layer_length.push_back(tlayer_length);
00155                         layer_HoleNo.push_back(tlayer_HoleNo);
00156                         layer_SkipHoles.push_back(tlayer_SkipHoles);
00157                         layer_firstWire.push_back(tlayer_firstWire);
00158                         LayerNo++;
00159                 }
00160                 else{
00161                         status = 1;
00162                 }
00163                 buf_temp.str("");
00164                 buf_temp.clear();
00165         }
00166         buf_card.str("");
00167         buf_card.clear();
00168         return status;
00169 }
00170 
00171 //--------------------------Calculate---------------------------------
00172 //
00173 void CdcGeometryParameter::Calculate(){
00174         SimpleGeometryParameter::Calculate();
00175         layer_Rc.resize(LayerNo);
00176         layer_SPhi.resize(LayerNo);
00177         layer_angle4rotate.resize(LayerNo);
00178         layer_angle4stereo.resize(LayerNo);
00179         layer_holeDphi.resize(LayerNo);
00180         for ( G4int i = 0; i < LayerNo; i++ ){
00181                 layer_holeDphi[i]=2*pi/layer_HoleNo[i];
00182                 layer_angle4rotate[i]=layer_SkipHoles[i]*layer_holeDphi[i];
00183                 layer_angle4stereo[i]=atan(layer_Re[i]*sin(layer_angle4rotate[i]/2)*2/layer_length[i]);
00184                 layer_SPhi[i]=layer_holeDphi[i]*layer_firstWire[i];
00185                 layer_Rc[i]=layer_Re[i]*cos(layer_angle4rotate[i]/2);
00186         }
00187 }

00189 //---------------------------DumpInfo---------------------------------
00190 //output information
00191 void CdcGeometryParameter::DumpInfo() {
00192         SimpleGeometryParameter::DumpInfo();// dump info of its Parent Class first
00193         std::cout<<"------CdcGeometry info :--------"<<std::endl;
00194         std::cout<<"=>General info:"<<std::endl;
00195         std::cout<<" MotherLogicalVolume:  "<<MotherLogicalVolume<<std::endl;
00196         std::cout<<" SensitiveDetector:    "<<SensitiveDetector<<std::endl;
00197         std::cout<<" SDVolumeName:         "<<SDVolumeName<<std::endl;
00198         std::cout<<" MinStepLength:        "<<MinStepLength/cm<<" cm"<<std::endl;
00199 
00200         std::cout<<"=>Wires info:"<<std::endl;
00201         std::cout<<" SignalWireRadius:     "<<SignalWireRadius/um<<" um"<<std::endl;
00202         std::cout<<" FieldWireRadius:      "<<FieldWireRadius/um<<" um"<<std::endl;
00203         std::cout<<" signalWire material:  "<<SignalWireMaterial<<std::endl;
00204         std::cout<<" fieldWire material:   "<<FieldWireMaterial<<std::endl;
00205 
00206         std::cout<<"=>Layers info:"<<std::endl;
00207         std::cout<<" LayerNo: "<<LayerNo<<std::endl;
00208         std::cout<<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"T"
00209                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"Iw"
00210                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"Ic"
00211                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"Re"
00212                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"Rc"
00213                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"L"
00214                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"Nh"
00215                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"skip"
00216                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(6) <<"first"
00217                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(6) <<"alpha"
00218                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(6) <<"beta"
00219                 <<std::endl;
00220         std::cout<<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<""
00221                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<""
00222                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<""
00223                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"cm"
00224                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"cm"
00225                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"cm"
00226                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<""
00227                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<""
00228                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(6) <<""
00229                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(6) <<"rad"
00230                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(6) <<"rad"
00231                 <<std::endl;
00232         for ( G4int i = 0; i < LayerNo; i++ ){
00233                 std::cout<<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<layer_type[i]
00234                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<i
00235                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<layer_ID[i]
00236                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<layer_Re[i]/cm
00237                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<layer_Rc[i]/cm
00238                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<layer_length[i]/cm
00239                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<layer_HoleNo[i]
00240                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<layer_SkipHoles[i]
00241                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(6) <<layer_firstWire[i]
00242                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(6) <<layer_angle4rotate[i]/rad
00243                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(6) <<layer_angle4stereo[i]/rad
00244                         <<std::endl;
00245         }
00246 }
